title: Adventure Piano and Guitar Pluck Track (loop)
description: Contains 10 piano and guitar pluck mixed music tracks that will create a captivating atmosphere for your game scenes.
longDescription:
Demo audio Preview

Adventure Piano and Guitar Pluck Track

This is a great soft music package for glorious adventure games. It contains 10 piano and guitar pluck mixed music tracks that will create a captivating atmosphere for your game scenes. You can use this music for any kind of commercial content such as video games, animation, software, etc.

(YouTube content id disable )You will not receive copyright claims on YouTube when using this music, as it is not registered with YouTube's Content ID system. If you do receive a false claim, please contact me immediately.










Total 10 TRACK

  • Chill Night.wav: A soothing and relaxing track that evokes a calm night.
  • Dark Ground.wav: A mysterious track 
  • Glowry Adventure.wav: Dark 
  • Heaven Castle.wav: A majestic and elegant track that conveys a sense of royalty and grandeur.
  • Jungle Inn.wav: A lively and playful track that depicts a fun and adventurous journey in the jungle.
  • Right Door.wav: A curious and intriguing track that suggests a choice and a discovery.
  • Saturn Adventure.wav: A futuristic and sci-fi track that transports you to a different planet and dimension.
  • Train Night.wav: A smooth and rhythmic track that simulates a train ride at night.
  • Tuned Night.wav: A melodic and harmonious track that expresses a romantic and sentimental mood.
  • Walking Void.wav:
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 25

Supported Development Platforms:
